text: "The Walk" is a 1983 song by English gothic rock band The Cure and was released as a stand-alone single. It went to the top 20 in the United Kingdom and Ireland. ==Track listing== 7" # "The Walk" # "The Dream" 12" # "The Upstairs Room‚Äù # "The Dream" # "The Walk" # "Lament" US mini-LP # "The Upstairs Room" # "Just One Kiss" # "The Dream" # "The Walk" # "Lament" # "Let's Go to Bed (Extended Version)" (only available on some later European releases) == References == Category:1983 songs Category:The Cure songs
title: The Walk (The Cure song)
